name: Shelter Hotel Los Angeles
address: 457 South Mariposa Avenue, Los Angeles, CA 90020
description: This Los Angeles boutique hotel is 2 blocks from Wilshire Boulevard and 15 minutes from Universal Studios. This contemporary hotel features an outdoor pool and a table tennis room. Guestrooms at the Shelter Hotel Los Angeles are furnished with hardwood floors and a 50-inch flat-screen TV. The spacious rooms also feature modern bathrooms, a safety deposit box and a small refrigerator. WiFi is provided for a fee. Guests at the Los Angeles Shelter Hotel can take advantage of the tour and ticket assistance. A 24-hour front desk is also available. Downtown Los Angeles and Dodger Stadium are a 10-minute drive from Shelter Hotel. The Hollywood Walk of Fame is also a 10-mintue drive from the hotel and Beverly Hills is 20 minutes away.

name: Hyatt House La University Medical Center
address: 2200 East Trojan Way, Los Angeles, CA 90033
description: Located in Los Angeles, 2.5 miles from LA Union Station, Hyatt House LA - University Medical Center has accommodations with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness center and a garden. With a shared lounge, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Guests can enjoy Local dishes at the restaurant or have a drink at the bar. The rooms in the hotel are equipped with a TV with satellite channels. At Hyatt House LA - University Medical Center rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. An American breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. Hyatt House LA - University Medical Center offers a hot tub. A business center and vending machines with snacks and drinks are available on site at the hotel. Speaking English and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always at hand to help. Dodger Stadium is 3.8 miles from Hyatt House LA - University Medical Center, while Microsoft Theater is 4.9 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Hollywood Burbank Airport, 14 miles from the accommodation.

name: Sonesta ES Suites Chatsworth
description: Facilities The hotel offers a range of services and facilities for holiday makers and business guests alike. Internet access and wireless internet access are available to guests. Rooms The hotel offers non-smoking rooms. All rooms feature air conditioning, a living room, a kitchen and a bathroom. Each accommodation unit features separate bedrooms, a double bed or a sofa-bed. In addition, a fridge, a cooker and a microwave are available. Guests can enjoy a comfortable holiday with convenient amenities, including internet access, a telephone, a TV, a DVD player and wireless internet access. A hairdryer can also be found in each of the bathrooms. Sports/Entertainment Sport and leisure options are offered by the hotel and third-party operators. The hotel offers an outdoor pool. Leisure options available to guests include a gym. Meals Breakfast is bookable as a board option.WebBeds

name: AIR Venice on the Beach
description: Located on the famous Oceanfront Walk, these historic hotel rooms boast beautiful views of Venice Beach and the Pacific Ocean. Free WiFi is available in all areas. A flat-screen TV is included in each bright room at AIR Venice on the Beach. Hardwood floors and a coffee maker are also included. This property does not have air conditioning but guests can enjoy the ocean breeze. Guests of this lively beachfront property can enjoy a variety of outdoor activities or simply just relax and take in the sights along the Venice Beach Boardwalk. Laundry services and bicycle rentals are available upon request. Weekend concierge service is also available. Downtown Santa Monica is less than 2.5 miles from Venice AIR on the Beach. The world famous Hollywood Boulevard is 16 miles away.

name: La Quinta Inn & Suites LAX
address: 5249 West Century Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90045
description: Staying at the La Quinta Inn & Suites LAX could easily turn into a day at the beach, as Manhattan Beach, Venice Beach, Redondo Beach, Marina Del Ray, and more are within 6 miles. Hollywood, Beverly Hills, and downtown Los Angeles are also easily accessible via the 405. Universal Studios is less than 14 miles away, while Disneyland is a short 27-mile drive from the hotel. Conveniently located less than a mile from one of the world's busiest airports and within five miles of Manhattan Beach, the ten-story La Quinta Inn & Suites LAX is a welcoming oasis for travel weary guests. Just off the 405 Freeway, this full-service hotel features an onsite restaurant (American menu only, open 5pm-10pm), fitness center, and meeting/banquet facilities. Bar open from 5-11pm. Wireless high-speed Internet access is available throughout the hotel as well.Our spacious guest rooms and suites feature convenient amenities pillow-top mattresses, like free wireless high-speed Internet access, a coffee maker, free local calls, voicemail, and premium cable TV channels. Microwaves and refrigerators are also available by request. Take advantage of the hotel's free Bright Side Breakfast served each morning. Hours from 6am-9am Monday- Friday. Sat-Sun 7-10am. For more information or to book meeting facilities at this hotel, please email lq2005bsm@laquinta.com. Parking is available for Registered guests at a fee of 30 USD plus tax per day. No oversized vehicle parking available.All Reservations require valid Credit Card at check inWyndham

name: AC Hotel by Marriott Beverly Hills
description: Your luxury hotel in Beverly Hills. The AC Hotel Beverly Hills draws on its European Roots and Beverly Hills style to curate an elevated travel experience. Discover luxury in the heart of LA when you stay at one of the best hotels in Beverly Hills. Your hotel room reservation features pillow-top mattresses, luxury linens, mini-fridges, free Wi-Fi and smart TVs. Access our 24-hour AC Store and Fitness Center as well as ACE, our robot butler, is always on call to deliver sundries and snacks to your room. Spend your evenings at our AC Lounge with a craft beer or creative cocktails. Our Rooftop Patio has 360º views, showcasing the world-renowned Hollywood sign, or take a dip in our Rooftop Sunning Pool. Hotel room bookings located only two miles from Rodeo Drive, the city vibe is at our doorstop with the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Petersen Automotive Museums within a few short blocks. Whether you're here for business or leisure, let's get you a hotel room reservation today!Marriott

name: Vagabond Inn Sylmar
description: This motel is 12 miles from Six Flags Magic Mountain Theme Park in Sylmar, California. All rooms include cable TV with extended channels and free WiFi. Around the clock reception is offered at Vagabond Inn Sylmar. Fax and photocopying services are available. Vending machines featuring snacks and drinks are located on site. Universal Studios Hollywood is 15 miles from this motel. Dodger Stadium, home of the Los Angeles Dodgers Major League baseball team, is 30 minutes’ drive away.

name: Courtyard by Marriott Los Angeles Woodland Hills
description: The best location in Woodland Hills. Located right off the 101 freeway between De Soto and Canoga Avenue in the heart of the San Fernando Valley. Our contemporary guest room design featuring complimentary Wi-Fi, refrigerator, coffee maker and HD TVs. Large outdoor pool area perfectly heated year round and sundeck - ideal for relaxing on weekends! name: Residence Inn Los Angeles Lax/Manhattan Beach

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/Hollywood, CA
description: The Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/Hollywood hotel is set in a vibrant area near popular attractions and businesses. Featuring modern interior design, our Hollywood hotel offers comfortable guest rooms with free WiFi, a microwave, mini-refrigerator and clean and fresh Hampton beds®. Other amenities include a work desk with an ergonomic chair, an alarm clock radio plus tea and coffee making facilities. Select one of our stylish suites for extra space, a separate living area with a wet bar. Start your day with a free hot breakfast – we serve a selection of hot and cold items and freshly baked waffles. Grab something tasty from the 24-hour convenience store or stop by the Front Desk for some insider tips on local restaurants and bars. Keep up your exercise routine in the fitness center, take a dip in the outdoor heated pool or rejuvenate in our spa. Our Los Angeles hotel also features a business center and 1000 sq. ft. of meeting space for up to 50 people. Catering options are also available.Hilton

description: Travel like you live at the Residence Inn by Marriott Chatsworth - San Fernando Valley's newest all-suite hotel. Kick back and socialize in our outdoor spaces which include fire pit seating to warm up and wind down or cook up a storm with our BBQ grill. name: Venice V Hotel
description: Experience Venice Beach like a local at the V — Venice's only beachfront lifestyle hotel, designed in a soulfully reimagined 1915 landmark. Inside each distinct room, suite, and rooftop bungalow, original period details seamlessly blend with modern amenities.and every room offers a stunning Pacific ocean view. At long last, your perfect Venice Beach hideaway is here.

address: 1177 South Beverly Drive, Los Angeles, CA 90035

description: This Torrance, California hotel offers spacious all-suite accommodations furnished with full kitchens and free wireless internet and is located near corporate offices as well as Redondo and Hermosa Beach. name: Hampton Inn Los Angeles Int'l Airport/Hawthorne
description: Boasting a central location near L.A.'s major highways, I-405 and I-105 and just three miles from Los Angeles International Airport, the Hampton Inn Los Angeles Int'l Airport/Hawthorne hotel offers easy access to numerous shopping malls, corporate headquarters and popular L.A. attractions. Visit Disneyland, Knotts Berry Farm and the Hollywood Walk of Fame or soak up the California sunshine on Venice Beach. Chill drinks in the refrigerator, heat up snacks in the microwave and check emails with free WiFi at the ergonomic desk. Each morning of your stay, savor Hampton's free hot breakfast buffet, featuring a tempting variety of hot and cold items and enjoy free tea and coffee in the welcoming lobby 24-hours a day. Pick up chilled meals, snacks or travel essentials from our 24-hour Suite Shop. After a long flight, unwind with our onsite leisure amenities. Energize with the latest exercise equipment in the free fitness center or swim lengths of the indoor pool. Surf the web or print documents in the free, 24-hour business center and hold an event in the hotel's flexible meeting room. Friendly service, clean rooms, comfortable surroundings, every time. If you're not satisfied, we don't expect you to pay. That's our commitment and your guarantee. That's 100% Hampton.Hilton

name: Hotel Angeleno
address: 170 North Church Lane, Los Angeles, CA 90049

description: Located 10 miles from Battleship USS Iowa Museum, Studio 6 Carson, CA provides rooms with air conditioning in Carson. This 2-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk. name: Airtel Plaza Hotel
description: Located next to the Van Nuys Airport, this family-friendly business hotel is geographically situated in the centre of the San Fernando Valley. Attractions such as the Getty Center (15-minute drive), Universal Studios (20 minutes), Griffith Observatory (30 minutes), Hollywood (20 minutes), Downtown Los Angeles, Santa Monica beach (20 minutes) and Beverly Hills are all in the vicinity of the city hotel. The Amtrak train station is a 5-minute drive from the airport hotel. Facilities The hotel features 267 accommodation units. Guests of the hotel are welcomed in the lobby, which has a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service. Lift access is provided to the upper floors. Amenities include a safe. Internet access and wireless internet access are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options include a restaurant, a dining area, a breakfast room, a café and a bar. Guests can buy holiday mementos from the souvenir shop. Shopping facilities are available. A garden is among the features contributing to a pleasant stay. In addition, a conference room, a business centre and a fax machine are also available. Rooms The hotel offers non-smoking rooms. All rooms feature air conditioning, central heating and a bathroom. Bathrooms with wheelchair access can also be booked. The carpeted accommodation units feature a double bed or a king-size bed. In addition, a mini-fridge, a microwave and tea and coffee making equipment are available. An ironing set is also available to guests. Internet access, a telephone, a TV, a radio, an alarm clock and wireless internet access are provided for guests' convenience. Wheelchair-accessible accommodation units are also bookable. In each of the bathrooms, guests will find a shower, a bathtub and a hairdryer. Sports/Entertainment Sport and leisure options are offered by the hotel and third-party operators. The hotel offers an outdoor pool. Sun loungers and parasols offer the ideal way to unwind. A hot tub provides an opportunity for relaxation. Leisure options available to guests include a gym. Meals The hotel offers the following bookable meals and board options: breakfast, lunch and dinner. Special meals, including special dietary cuisine, are available. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the hotel: American Express, VISA, Diners Club, JCB and MasterCard.WebBeds

name: Rodeway Inn South Gate - Los Angeles South

description: Travel simply at the pet-friendly Rodeway Inn South Gate - Los Angeles South hotel in South Gate, CA near Los Angeles. All modern guest rooms include a mini fridge and microwave, free Wi-Fi, extended cable service, and local calls. Select rooms have a kitchenette. Premium Wi-Fi is offered. name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Los Angeles Redondo Beach
description: Welcome to the brand new Homewood Suites by Hilton Los Angeles Redondo Beach hotel. This modern, all-suite hotel is ideal for short trips or extended stays in Los Angeles, CA. The hotel is less than 5 miles from LAX and 4.5 miles from Redondo Beach Pier, offering a wealth of oceanfront dining, shopping and entertainment. Nearby attractions include Stub Hub Center, Redondo Beach Performing Arts Center and the Centinela Valley Center for the Arts. Business travelers will appreciate our close proximity to many fortune 500 companies. Feel at home from the moment you arrive. We offer a free, full hot breakfast every morning and complimentary evening dinner and drinks* Monday - Thursday. Our spacious studio, one and two-bedroom suites feature two HDTVs, complimentary WiFi and a fully equipped kitchen. Keep up your exercise routine in the fitness center or simply relax by the outdoor pool and whirlpool to soak up the California sunshine. If you’re planning an event, we offer two flexible meeting rooms which can accommodate up to 90 guests. *Subject to state and local laws. Must be of legal drinking age.Hilton

name: Hilton Garden Inn Los Angeles/Hollywood
address: 2005 North Highland Avenue, Los Angeles, CA 90068
description: Nestled in the heart of Hollywood within the city of Los Angeles is the Hilton Garden Inn Los Angeles/Hollywood hotel. A short walk, drive, or commuter trek to many prominent corporations and local attractions. This Los Angeles hotel is the ideal location for business and leisure travelers. If you find yourself in Los Angeles for a convention at the Los Angeles Convention Center, a business meeting downtown, or a movie deal in Hollywood, the Hilton Garden Inn Los Angeles/Hollywood has every amenity plus great location the on-the-go traveler needs to pull it all together. The Hilton Garden Inn Los Angeles/Hollywood is centrally located near Disney/Dreamworks Studios, Sony Corporation, Capitol Records, Warner Brothers, Eastman Kodak, Deliotte and Touche, NBCUniversal, Panasonic, Telemundo, and Coca Cola. Located within walking distance to the world famous Hollywood Walk of Fame, Hollywood Bowl, TCL Chinese Theatre, and Dolby Theatre. In town for a concert, we are only minutes away from Universal Studios, Greek Theatre, and Nokia Theatre L.A. Live. Keep connected while exploring or working, stay in touch at the complimentary 24-hour business center or host a training seminar or event in the meeting room totaling 546 sq. ft. Pick up essentials at the Pavilion Pantry convenience mart. Work out at the fully equipped fitness center. Enjoy a swim in the outdoor pool or a soak in the heated whirlpool. Stay fresh with the hotel laundry facilities. This hotel serves tasty American favorites at the Garden Grille, with a special kids menu and offers freshly-prepared evening room service. Sip drinks in the Reel Lounge. With friendly and attentive staff, comfortable accommodations, and central location the Hilton Garden Inn Los Angeles/Hollywood is the perfect location.Hilton

description: Hyatt Place LAX/Century BLVD has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness center, a restaurant and bar in Los Angeles. The hotel offers a hot tub.

description: Set in an historic building, Palihotel Westwood Village is located in the Westwood area of Los Angeles, 2.2 mi from Getty Center and 6.6 mi from the Santa Monica Pier. The nearest airport is Los Angeles International Airport, 8.7 mi from the accommodations. Melrose Avenue is 6.2 mi away. Rodeo Drive, UCLA and the Hammer Museum are 7 minutes or less from the property by car.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Los Angeles/Redondo Beach
description: Enjoy a stay in the heart of the Redondo Beach community at Hilton Garden Inn Los Angeles/Redondo Beach. Perfect for visitors to the Space Park, this hotel in Redondo Beach is located in the Northrop Grumman campus. Relax and unwind in a comfortable guest room, equipped with all you need for a productive stay. Stay connected with complimentary WiFi and work in comfort at the desk with ergonomic chair. Order evening room service or stock up on travel necessities, such as snacks and drinks, at the 24-hour Pavilion Pantry. At the end of a busy day, sleep soundly in the comfortable Garden Sleep System bed. Start your day with a delicious cooked-to-order breakfast at the Garden Grille restaurant, also open for lunch and dinner. In the evenings, relax with colleagues over drinks in the welcoming bar. Take a refreshing dip in the outdoor swimming pool, unwind in the whirlpool or reinvigorate with a workout in the fitness center, equipped with a range of cardiovascular and weight training equipment. Stay on top of work using the services in the 24-hour business center, including fax, printing and copying. Let our professional team members help plan your next event at the Hilton Garden Inn hotel in Redondo Beach. With 2,500 sq.ft. of meeting and event space, the hotel can accommodate a banquet for up to 100 guests and also offers a boardroom for intimate meetings of 12.Hilton

name: DoubleTree by Hilton San Pedro - Port of Los Angeles
address: 2800 Via Cabrillo Marina, San Pedro, CA 90731
description: Discover soothing ocean breezes magnificently blended with relaxing accommodations and attentive service at Doubletree Hotel San Pedro. An ideal option for San Pedro, California hotels near Long Beach Airport, we offer an enchanting locale overlooking the beautiful Cabrillo Marina, only a mile from the bustling Port of Los Angeles Cruise Terminal and within 30 minutes of Long Beach Airport (LGB) and Los Angeles International Airport (LAX). For your Southern California vacation or business travel, this Doubletree hotel near San Pedro Cruise Port and many major corporations is also perfectly situated to provide convenient access to: Aquarium of the Pacific - 6 miles, Catalina Express at Port of San Pedro - 2.5 miles, Disneyland - 25 miles, Downtown Los Angeles - 24 miles, Graumman’s Chinese Theatre - 30 miles, Hollywood Walk of Fame - 30 miles, Knott's Berry Farm - 30 miles, Long Beach - 6 miles, Los Angeles, Zoo - 22 miles, Ports O' Call Village - 1 mile, Port of Los Angeles - 1 mile, The Queen Mary - 7 miles, Trump National Golf Course - 4 miles Universal Studios - 26 miles After your travels or a day of meetings, your elegantly-appointed Port of Los Angeles hotel room will surely be a welcome sight. Sink into your plush Sweet Dreams by Doubletree bed, call for room service, and order an On-Demand movie. If work is a must, utilize high-speed Internet access, a well-lit work space and an ergonomic desk chair. A top choice for pet-friendly San Pedro, CA hotels, our extensive amenities and services at the Doubletree Hotel San Pedro continue throughout and include: Business center - complimentary and open 24-hours, complimentary shuttle - available on weekdays and within a five-mile radius of our San Pedro hotel, fitness center, flexible function space, with exquisite catering and more than 16,000 square feet in 10 San Pedro meeting rooms, including a 5,000 square-foot ballroom with scenic views of the Pacific Ocean, one of the best wedding locations in Southern California, Marina Bar and Grill, a Southern California hotel restaurant with oceanfront views and an outside patio, serving fresh, California cuisine with Italian flair: open daily from 6:00 a.m. to 11:00 p.m; pet friendly accommodations, for animals up to 50 lbs with a non-refundable $50 pet fee, room service, so you can enjoy a mouthwatering meal in your room or suite, Recreation options, including a heated outdoor swimming pool with whirlpool, tennis courts, jogging/walking trails and fishing, We offer complimentary shuttle service to the World Cruise Center located in San Pedro (We do not provide transportation to the Carnival Cruise Line in Long Beach). When searching for the finest of Southern California hotels in San Pedro, stay at Doubletree Hotel San Pedro, where you are invited to experience breathtaking vistas and a variety of exhilarating things to do, complemented by our superior service and thoughtful amenities. Reserve your stay now for our Lowest Internet Rate Guarantee and be sure to check our California vacation packages for premium savings.Hilton

It offers an outdoor pool and sundeck, café and lounge, and newly renovated rooms with a refrigerator. Sonesta Select Los Angeles Torrance South Bay provides a coffee maker, lounge chair and a work desk in all rooms. Cable TV and Free Wi-Fi are also included. Guests can choose from a variety of food options and Starbucks coffee at The Commons at Sonesta Select or get drinks at the Lobby Lounge. Sonesta Select Los Angeles Torrance South Bay is a 10-minute drive to Los Angeles International Airport. The Long Beach Convention Center is 20 minutes away.

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Los Angeles LAX/El Segundo
address: 2135 East El Segundo Boulevard, El Segundo, CA 90245
description: Minutes from Toyota Sports Performance Center, Manhattan Beach, Sofi Stadium, Redondo Beach Performing Arts, and YouTube Theater, the Residence Inn Los Angeles El Segundo invites you to thrive at our hotel near LAX Airport. Our studio, one-, and two-bedroom suites – some with ovens and fireplaces – feature free high-speed Wi-Fi, free hot breakfast, and separate living and sleeping areas with well-lit desks and fully equipped kitchens. Enjoy our outdoor pool and 24-hour fitness center. As one of the most convenient hotels near Sofi Stadium, we’re your gateway to LA beach areas, Marina del Rey, and Malibu. Business or pleasure trips to El Segundo and Manhattan Beach are convenient, as we are close to many companies, including Raytheon, General Dynamics, Northrop Grumman, Chevron, Aerospace Corp, Xerox, SAIC, Mattel, Boeing, Accenture, Sketchers USA, and Oracle. Each room includes a sofa bed, a refrigerator and a coffee machine. Each private bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries. Hyatt Place Hotel shuttle from Los Angeles International Airport is available 5:00AM to 10:45PM. Pick-up located on the upper level (Departures). Wait by the RED Hotel Shuttle sign. Please note that the shuttle cannot wait at the designated pick-up, please contact shuttle once you are ready and by the designated pick-up sign. For pick-up requests text/call +1 (949) 201-7665 and provide your name, phone number, number of passengers, and terminal. Shuttle will only accept passengers who text/call once they’re ready for pick-up. Shuttle time is 6am-10:45pm

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Los Angeles International Airport South
address: 1440 East Imperial Avenue, El Segundo, CA 90245
description: Experience the Finest of California and LAX Hotels LAX hotels come no finer than the Embassy Suites Los Angeles - International Airport/South Hotel, located just two miles from Los Angeles International Airport (LAX) in the quiet community of El Segundo, CA, home to numerous Fortune 500 companies and the heart of Southern California's aerospace community. Guests at our hotel stay in spacious two-room suites and receive a delicious free made-to-order breakfast each morning and hosted beverages and snacks every evening at our Evening Reception. The Embassy Suites - LAX South is ideal for a Southern California vacation with a wide array of local beaches in the surrounding communities: Manhattan Beach, Marina Del Rey, Redondo Beach, Venice Beach, Santa Monica, home of the Third Street Promenade. This all-suite Los Angeles hotel is just minutes from the Los Angeles Air Force Base, as well as the campus of Loyola Marymount University. The Embassy Suites - LAX South is one of the premier Los Angeles vacation hotels with wonderful amenities and an endless variety of surrounding tourist attractions, making this hotel perfect for southern California family vacations! This Los Angeles hotel offers high-speed Internet access throughout, as well as an on-site ATM. A lush tropical atrium and Koi fish, ducks, and turtles in gently flowing waterscapes, combined with the Mediterranean-style architecture, provide the perfect setting for a relaxing LA visit. 1440 bistro & bar, a contemporary twist on American fare, is located in the Embassy Suites Los Angeles - International Airport/South hotel. The lounge features a wide variety of spirits and wine, televisions with sporting events, and a pool table. This Los Angeles hotel is also ideal for business travelers, with its proximity to Los Angeles International Airport, Internet access throughout, and 11 meeting spaces. These spaces can be easily converted for a Southern California wedding, reception, and other special events. In order to stand out among other El Segundo hotels, we offer prime California accommodations with its convenient locale and extensive amenities. Visit one of the exciting Los Angeles tourist attractions in the area: Chinatown, Downtown Los Angeles, Rodeo Drive in Beverly Hills, The Fashion District of Los Angeles, The Hollywood Walk of Fame, The Los Angeles County Museum of Art, The Paul Getty Museum, The Queen Mary in Long Beach, The Staples Center - home of professional basketball teams, and Universal Studios. The Embassy Suites Hotel Los Angeles - International Airport/South invites you to indulge in this upscale, full-service hotel and all of the extensive services and amenities provided. Make your reservations now to ensure secure online booking at our Best Available Rate, or take advantage of the terrific Southern California vacation deals of our LAX hotel!Hilton

name: Sonesta Select Los Angeles LAX El Segundo
address: 2000 East Mariposa Avenue, El Segundo, CA 90245
description: Located within walking distance of Mariposa Los Angeles Metro Station, Sonesta Select Los Angeles LAX El Segundo features free Wi-Fi, an outdoor pool and a free shuttle service. It offers 3-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. Guests can soak up the sun on the terrace or enjoy a drink at the bar. Corporate amenities include meeting rooms and a business centre. Sonesta Select Los Angeles LAX El Segundo provides 146 rooms, each with a refrigerator, tea and coffee making facilities and a private bathroom. Rooms also include flat-screen TVs and ample workspace. Guests staying at the hotel can enjoy a unique dining experience at the on-site restaurant, conveniently based for those who want to stay close for a meal. Los Angeles International Airport is around a 10-minute car ride from Sonesta Select Los Angeles LAX El Segundo and El Segundo Los Angeles Metro Station is within walking distance. Those wishing to explore the area can also visit Los Angeles, located an easy drive from the property.HotelsCombined

name: The Anza - A Calabasas Hotel
description: Located off of Highway 101, this hotel is 12 miles from Malibu beaches. It features an outdoor pool and all rooms have free Wi-Fi. A flat-screen cable TV is included in every room at The Anza – a Calabasas Hotel. A microwave, a refrigerator and a work desk are also provided. The front desk at The Anza – a Calabasas Hotel is staffed 24 hours a day. There are coin laundry facilities on site, as well as a business center. The Commons at Calabasas is a 5-minute walk from this hotel. The Hollywood Walk of Fame and Universal Studios are within 20 miles of The Anza – a Calabasas Hotel.

name: Cambria Hotel Burbank Airport
address: 3525 N San Fernando Blvd, Burbank, CA 91505
description: Cambria Hotel Burbank Airport is closely located to both the airport and city attractions. Our stylish Burbank, CA hotel includes an on-site restaurant, free WiFi, fitness center, grab-and-go market and meeting space. Design-forward guest rooms offer premium bedding, modern decor, spa-style bathrooms and Bluetooth mirrors. The Cambria Hotel Burbank Airport is located less than 1 mile from Burbank International Airport and has a variety of nearby attractions, including Griffith Park, Warner Brothers VIP Tour, Walt Disney Studios and the Los Angeles Zoo. Plus, you can earn rewards, including free nights and gift cards, with our Choice Privileges rewards program.Choice Hotels

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Santa Monica
description: Newly opened in 2017, Hampton Inn & Suites Santa Monica is just three blocks from the iconic Santa Monica Pier, perfectly located to enjoy a fun-filled day at the beach. The hotel is within walking distance of Downtown Santa Monica's best entertainment, dining and the world-famous alfresco shopping of the Third Street Promenade. We are located adjacent to the Metro Expo Line. Catch the Expo Light Rail for easy transportation to Los Angeles downtown Hollywood, just 7 miles away. After a busy day, enjoy our stylish second-story loft pool and deck, or retire to your spacious guest room or suite for a restful night's sleep. Our guest rooms are designed for the modern business traveler with energy-conserving LED lights, free WiFi and plenty of plugs to charge your devices. Relax and watch your favorite shows on a stunning 50-inch HDTV. For more space and upgraded amenities, choose one of our suites for a balcony, sitting area, wet bar and extra space to stretch out. Upgrade to a larger studio suite and enjoy a luxurious wrap-around patio and partial ocean views. Start the day off right with free hot breakfast served daily, Monday through Friday.Hilton

name: Best Western Royal Palace Inn & Suites
address: 2528 South Sepulveda Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90064-3123
description: The beautiful Best Western Royal Palace Inn & Suites is located in the heart of California. Literally minutes from Beverly Hills, the Santa Monica Pier, Venice Beach, and UCLA you will truly see it all. Whether you are in town for business or pleasure the Best Western Royal Palace Inn & Suites has you covered with convenient amenities, an incredible location, and unbeatable prices. The stunning town of Santa Monica is minutes away from our perfectly located hotel. Experience the warm California surf at the Santa Monica State beach while getting your tan on. Visit Rodeo Drive and shop in style. While you are out be sure to visit some of the most unbelievable restaurants the entire country has to offer, ask our friendly front desk staff for great recommendations! Our Los Angeles hotel features suites with two televisions and a separate sitting room. Go ahead and make yourself at home. We offer 57 channels, all in HD. All rooms have a refrigerator, microwave, coffeemaker, and safe. Valet parking on site! Don’t forget a full complimentary breakfast to sweeten the deal. Dig into a full breakfast of pancakes, endless cereal, yogurts, fresh fruits and stacks of sweet pastries, and get ready to start your day. Complete the meal with chilled juices and 100% Arabica coffee. If you need to burn off some of the extra breakfast calories we have an exercise facility and a refreshing outdoor swimming pool begging for you to dip your feet in. If you’re in town on business, we’ve got you covered. Regular guests at the Best Western Royal Palace Inn & Suites include employees of Fox Studios, Sony Studios, UCLA, the Federal Building, Sofi Stadium, Hollywood Park Casino and workers heading to the FBI Headquarters. We are also conveniently situated right down the street from the Metro Expo Line which will take you right to the Los Angeles Convention Center. No matter the reason for your visit we are positive you will be satisfied with our wonderful hotel. Book your spectacular stay with us. Pet rooms must be reserved if traveling with a pet. Limited number of pet rooms available.bestwestern.com

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles Burbank Airport
description: The Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles Burbank Airport is located in the center of everything: the Bob Hope Airport, shopping, dining, and entertainment are all within minutes of the hotel. See one of your favorite game shows or late night talk shows in person. We are proud to have Disney, Universal Studios, NBC, CBS & Fox as our neighbors, in the heart of Burbank. Feel like seeing more? Visit Six Flags Magic Mountain, Disneyland, California Adventure Land or Knott’s Berry Farm Amusement parks for a thrill you and your family will be sure not to forget. Surf on over to the Santa Monica beach and Pier or cruise on over to the Venice Boardwalk for authentic street entertainment. If your into snowboarding or skiing Big Bear lake, Mountain High & Snow Summit are only hours away! Whether you're surfing the web or checking your e-mail, take advantage of our complimentary high-speed Internet access in our guest rooms and lobby area to save you time and money. Our guest rooms come equipped with a large work desk equipped and an ergonomic chair and a data port for wired connectivity. Feel like relaxing on the bed and working? Our Cloud Nine bed does away with the old-fashioned bedspread, featuring instead a, white duvet cover, enveloping a lofty white comforter. The bed features four pillows providing consumers a choice in firmness (some filled with soft down, some with firmer foam), a lumbar pillow in a soothing color that provides guests back support if they choose to read, watch television or enjoy the Hampton lap desk and work wirelessly while resting in bed. Relax and unwind with an in-room movie or take advantage of our heated pool and spa. Working through the night and need a late night energy boost? Purchase a light snack or drink from our convenient suite shop located in lobby. And don't forget about the complimentary On the House hot breakfast in the morning. Our new utensils, made from 100% renewable resources, will help you reduce your carbon footprint, one step at a time, and feed your hunger all in a days work. In a hurry? Grab one of our On The Run Breakfast Bags with over 20 different items to start each day off right. Before you start your day, don't forget to grab a complimentary cup of coffee/tea or pick-up a copy of the latest USA Today in the lobby each morning. We also provide complimentary parking and shuttle service to the Burbank Airport. Every stay with the Hampton Inn & Suites Burbank Airport offers you additional points and miles for your travel, so sign up for your Hilton HHonors loyalty program today! Our unconditional 100% Hampton Guarantee ensures our travelers complete satisfaction. Friendly service, clean rooms, comfortable surroundings, every time. If you are not completely satisfied, we don't expect you to pay. That's our commitment and your guarantee. That's 100% HamptonHilton

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Lax El Segundo
address: 888 North Pacific Coast Highway, El Segundo, CA 90245
description: From the sleek design of our lobby to the vibrantly decorated rooms, Hampton Inn & Suites LAX El Segundo is a great choice for Los Angeles travelers. Be close to aerospace companies, the beach and downtown LA. Our spacious rooms feature free WiFi, a 43-inch HDTV and plenty of plugs to charge your devices. Choose a room with a king or two queen beds. Several corner rooms offer full glass balconies. Upgrade to a suite for extra space, a sofa bed and wet bar. Head to the lobby for free hot breakfast each morning, or grab on of Hampton’s On the Run™ Breakfast Bags, available Monday through Friday. At end of your day, stop by the lobby bar and dine on light fare and drinks. Stay committed to your workout goals in our fitness center and unwind in our indoor pool. Finish that last minute project in our business center which provides access to a computer, faxing and printing capabilities.Hilton

name: Extended Stay America Suites - Los Angeles - Torrance Harborgate Way
description: This Extended Stay America - Los Angeles - Torrance Harbor Gateway is located in Torrance and especially designed for longer stays, with all rooms featuring a fully equipped kitchen. The hotel offers free WiFi and a 24-hour front desk. Every kitchen at Extended Stay America - Los Angeles is equipped with a stovetop, microwave and a fridge. The hotel also provides guests with laundry and ironing facilities, as well as upgraded bedding with extra pillows. Weekly housekeeping services are provided for free and daily services are provided for a fee. Clean towels and linens can be exchanged at the front desk. The free grab-and-go breakfast includes breakfast bars, muffins, hot cereal, coffee, and tea. The property offers free onsite parking. Attractions within close proximity to the hotel include the Exxon Mobil, the Redondo Beach Pier and the Home Depot Center.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles/Sherman Oaks
description: The Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles Van Nuys Hotel California features 96 luxurious guest rooms and suites with all the amenities today's business and leisure travelers expect. The Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles Van Nuys Hotel California is located north of Los Angeles just off of freeways 405 and 101: 6 miles north of the Universal Studios Park. We love having you here at the Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles Van Nuys Hotel California.Hilton

name: Courtyard by Marriott Marina del Rey
address: 4360 Via Marina, Marina del Rey, CA 90292
description: Courtyard Marina del Rey is a bright, modern, new hotel located on the marina in the heart of Marina del Rey. Stay at our hotel to be near popular attractions like the Santa Monica Boardwalk, Venice Fishing Pier and Marina Beach. Our hotel is unique in that it is connected to a Residence Inn® hotel, allowing you to take advantage of extra amenities like guest laundry facilities, a larger fitness center and additional event space. Our state-of-the-art lobby provides greater flexibility and choices for hotel guests. At the center of it all is Brizo Bar & Restaurant, your destination for a great weekend brunch or drinks and dinner in the evening. You'll also enjoy inviting, flexible spaces with free Wi-Fi where you can work or relax. Plus, our well-equipped fitness center and outdoor pool will help you stay refreshed and energized. Whether visiting our hotel for business or pleasure, your stay at Courtyard Marina del Rey is sure to be more comfortable, more productive and more enjoyable than ever!Marriott

name: Holiday Inn Los Angeles Gateway - Torrance
description: A Great Hotel for Business or Pleasure in Sunny Los Angeles, CA. The Holiday Inn® Los Angeles Gateway Torrance features deluxe guest rooms and suites including complimentary Wi-Fi, refrigerators, and Keurig coffee makers. Our banquet facilities offer a perfect setting for any business or social event, complete with on-site catering. Located in the Harbor Gateway business district with easy access to I-110, I-405 and 91 freeways you're 15 minutes away from Los Angeles International Airport, Downtown Los Angeles, and LA Live/Convention Center. The Port of LA and Long Beach are also nearby. Business travelers take advantage of being a mile from Honda, and Herbalife. Endless SoCal fun begins as close as South Bay beaches and nearby golf. Create family memories with short drives to Disneyland® Park, Knott's Berry Farm, Universal Studios, & the world-famous Santa Monica Pier. In the mood for shopping, visit Del Amo Fashion Center or take a day trip to Rodeo Drive. Sports enthusiast enjoys being 2.5 mi. from Dignity Health Sports Park. Catch Lakers, Clippers, Kings game at Staples Center or Dodgers, USC football game at their Stadiums. During downtime, visit our Ginger Lounge, take a refreshing dip in our outdoor pool, or enjoy the peaceful sounds of the lobby's koi pond. Start over by checking out our well-equipped fitness center to start your day refreshed.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Ramada by Wyndham Torrance
description: Free Wireless High Speed Internet Access. Buffet Breakfast. Torrance Airport Nearby. 1 Mile from Del Amo Fashion Center. Across the street from 24 Hour Fitness Center, Shopping Center and Restaurants. Guest Laundry. Golf Course Nearby. 3 Miles from Redondo Beach Pier. Free Weekday USA Today. In room safes in all rooms at no charge. Outdoor Swimming Pool. Pet Friendly. Shanghai Palace Restaurant On Site. Guest rooms feature Sealy Posturepedic mattresses and new plush pillows. Incidental deposit is USD 100.00Wyndham

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Los Angeles L.A. LIVE
address: 901 West Olympic Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90015
description: Experience space with modern conveniences in the City of Angels at Residence Inn Los Angeles L.A. LIVE. Our dual-branded hotel near Oakland places you in the heart of the downtown district, across from the renowned Los Angeles Convention Center and next to the L.A. LIVE Campus. See a game at the nearby Crypto.com Arena (formerly Staples Center), or go to a concert at the Microsoft Theater, home to the Emmys and the American Music Awards. Back at our hotel, discover extended-stay, apartment-style living with valet parking and free Wi-Fi. Start each day with a complimentary hot breakfast and end with bistro-style cuisine at our hotel restaurant, Table 901. Soak up the California sunshine as you unwind by our third-floor rooftop pool. Each one of our 219 pet-friendly hotel suites showcases a full kitchen, a flat-screen TV, a well-lit work desk and stunning views of downtown L.A.Marriott
